pageProduct.name: Orzene Color Lock Conditioner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isopropyl Isostearate, Triticum Vulgare Gluten , 1,2-Hexanediol, Acetic Acid, Alcohol, Amodimethicone, Beer, C11-13 Isoparaffin, Calcium Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ceramide NG, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Gluconolactone, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Alcohol, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate, Panthenol, Parfum, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Trideceth-15, Trideceth-3, Triethylene Glycol, Benzoic Acid, DMDM Hydantoin, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal.

Directions

Apply on wet hair, massage gently and rinse thoroughly. For enhanced results, combine it with the rest ORZENE BEER COLOR LOCK products. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
